feed.title: Lion Group Holding Acquires Bitcoin to Strengthen Digital Treasury

feed.title: Lion Group Holding (NASDAQ: LGHL) Sets 1-for-13 ADS Ratio Change Effective for ADS Holders
feed.summary: Lion Group Holding (NASDAQ: LGHL) announced a 1-for-13 reverse ADS split, changing its ADS ratio from 1 ADS = 2,500 Class A ordinary shares to 1 ADS = 32,500 Class A ordinary shares, effective on or about November 26, 2025. This means every 13 existing ADSs will be exchanged for 1 new ADS, with no fees charged to ADS holders, and the ticker LGHL will remain on Nasdaq. Fractional entitlements will be aggregated, sold, and distributed as cash.

feed.title: Lion Group (LGHL) Plans Reverse ADS Split to Adjust Share Ratio
feed.summary: Lion Group Holding Ltd. (LGHL) is implementing a 1-for-13 reverse ADS split, changing its ADS ratio from 1 ADS representing 2,500 Class A shares to 1 ADS representing 32,500 Class A shares, effective around November 26. This adjustment aims to proportionally increase the trading price of its ADSs, though no specific price guarantees are made. The company operates an investor-focused trading platform but faces significant financial challenges, including negative revenue growth, liquidity constraints, and a high risk of bankruptcy.

feed.title: 194,726 HYPE Tokens: Lion Group Makes Complete Treasury Shift from SUI in Major Crypto Portfolio Move
feed.summary: Lion Group Holding Ltd. (NASDAQ: LGHL) has completed a strategic asset conversion, exchanging all of its SUI holdings for 194,726 HYPE (Hyperliquid) tokens through BitGo Trust Company. The company also holds 6,707 Solana (SOL) tokens and plans to convert these into HYPE, demonstrating its conviction in Hyperliquid's growth and its strategy to participate in on-chain markets. CEO Wilson Wang emphasized this move aligns with LGHL's trading platform strategy and belief in Hyperliquid's role in reshaping global market structure.

feed.title: Lion Group Holding schedules annual shareholder meeting for September 29
feed.summary: Lion Group Holding Ltd (NASDAQ:LGHL) will hold its Annual Shareholders’ Meeting on September 29, 2025. Shareholders of record as of September 2, 2025, are eligible to vote at the meeting, which will detail its agenda in a Form 6-K SEC filing. The company, incorporated in the Cayman Islands, operates in the security brokers, dealers, and flotation companies sector.

feed.title: Lion Group Holding Ltd. Announces Strategic Treasury Reallocation: Converting SOL and SUI Assets to Hyperliquid (HYPE) following U.S. Institutional Custody Milestone
feed.summary: Lion Group Holding Ltd. announced its decision to convert its entire holdings of Solana (SOL) and Sui (SUI) cryptocurrency assets into Hyperliquid (HYPE). This strategic reallocation follows the launch of institutional HYPE EVM custody solutions in the U.S. by BitGo Trust Company, Inc. and aims to optimize the company's cryptocurrency portfolio by leveraging Hyperliquid's high-performance Layer 1 blockchain and decentralized perpetual futures exchange capabilities. LGHL plans to use an accumulation strategy to convert these assets over time, aiming to lower acquisition costs through market volatility.

feed.title: Lion Group Holding completes $3 million convertible note offering
feed.summary: Lion Group Holding Ltd (NASDAQ: LGHL) announced the completion of a subsequent offering of a senior secured convertible note with a principal amount of $3 million to an institutional buyer. The offering includes a Right to Receive Tokens agreement, requiring the company to pay cash if tokens are not delivered. This transaction was conducted under an existing securities purchase agreement and relies on registration exemptions under the Securities Act of 1933.

feed.title: Lion Group Holding Ltd. (LGHL) Stock: $2M HYPE Token Move Kicks Off Bold DeFi Strategy
feed.summary: Lion Group Holding Ltd. (LGHL) has initiated a significant shift towards decentralized finance (DeFi) by acquiring $2 million worth of Hyperliquid (HYPE) tokens. This move is part of a larger strategy to build a crypto treasury using proceeds from an $11 million convertible debenture, with plans to also acquire Solana (SOL) and Sui (SUI) tokens. LGHL aims to diversify its holdings and participate in liquidity-rich, execution-first ecosystems to support its long-term growth and blockchain operations.

feed.title: Lion Group receives Nasdaq delinquency notice over share price
feed.summary: Lion Group Holding Ltd. (NASDAQ:LGHL) received a Nasdaq delinquency notice for failing to maintain a minimum bid price of $1.00 for its ordinary shares over 30 consecutive business days. The company, a diversified trading platform operator, has 180 days to regain compliance with Nasdaq's listing rules. Lion Group offers various trading services and operates a specialized SPAC sponsorship team.
